769             SELECT
770                 COUNT(*) as total_products,
771                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.is_active = true) as active_products,
772                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.is_active = false) as inactive_products,
773                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE COALESCE(o.stock_quantity, p.stock_quantity, 0) > 0) as in_stock,
774                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE COALESCE(o.stock_quantity, p.stock_quantity, 0) = 0) as out_of_stock,
775                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.account_type = 'main') as main_account,
776                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.account_type = 'fbe') as fbe_account,
777                 AVG(COALESCE(o.price, p.price, 0)) as avg_price,
778                 MIN(COALESCE(o.price, p.price, 0)) as min_price,
779                 MAX(COALESCE(o.price, p.price, 0)) as max_price,
780                 SUM(COALESCE(o.stock_quantity, p.stock_quantity, 0)) as total_stock,
781                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.sync_status = 'synced') as synced_products,
782                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.sync_status = 'pending') as pending_sync,
783                 COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.sync_status = 'failed') as failed_sync
784             FROM app.emag_products_v2 p
785             LEFT JOIN app.emag_product_offers_v2 o ON o.product_id = p.id

787         """)

1158         # Main unified query
1159         unified_query = text(f"""
1160             WITH local_products AS (
1161                 SELECT
1162                     p.id as local_id,
1163                     p.sku,
1164                     p.name,
1165                     p.description,
1166                     p.brand,
1167                     p.manufacturer,
1168                     p.base_price as local_price,
1169                     p.currency as local_currency,
1170                     p.is_active as local_is_active,
1171                     p.emag_part_number_key,
1172                     p.ean as local_ean,
1173                     p.created_at as local_created_at,
1174                     p.updated_at as local_updated_at
1175                 FROM app.products p
1176             ),
1177             emag_main_products AS (
1178                 SELECT
1179                     em.id as emag_id,
1180                     em.sku,
1181                     em.name,
1182                     em.price as emag_main_price,
1183                     em.stock_quantity as emag_main_stock,
1184                     em.is_active as emag_main_is_active,
1185                     em.sync_status as emag_main_sync_status,
1186                     em.last_synced_at as emag_main_last_synced,
1187                     em.emag_category_name as emag_main_category,
1188                     em.attributes as emag_main_attributes,
1189                     em.part_number_key as emag_main_pnk,
1190                     em.number_of_offers as emag_main_offers,
1191                     em.buy_button_rank as emag_main_rank
1192                 FROM app.emag_products_v2 em
1193                 WHERE em.account_type = 'main'
1194             ),
1195             emag_fbe_products AS (
1196                 SELECT
1197                     em.id as emag_id,
1198                     em.sku,
1199                     em.name,
1200                     em.price as emag_fbe_price,
1201                     em.stock_quantity as emag_fbe_stock,
1202                     em.is_active as emag_fbe_is_active,
1203                     em.sync_status as emag_fbe_sync_status,
1204                     em.last_synced_at as emag_fbe_last_synced,
1205                     em.emag_category_name as emag_fbe_category,
1206                     em.attributes as emag_fbe_attributes,
1207                     em.part_number_key as emag_fbe_pnk,
1208                     em.number_of_offers as emag_fbe_offers,
1209                     em.buy_button_rank as emag_fbe_rank
1210                 FROM app.emag_products_v2 em
1211                 WHERE em.account_type = 'fbe'
1212             ),
1213             unified AS (
1214                 SELECT
1215                     COALESCE(lp.sku, em.sku, ef.sku) as sku,
1216                     COALESCE(lp.name, em.name, ef.name) as name,
1217                     lp.local_id,
1218                     lp.description,
1219                     lp.brand,
1220                     lp.manufacturer,
1221                     lp.local_price,
1222                     lp.local_currency,
1223                     lp.local_is_active,
1224                     lp.local_created_at,
1225                     lp.local_updated_at,
1226                     em.emag_id as emag_main_id,
1227                     em.emag_main_price,
1228                     em.emag_main_stock,
1229                     em.emag_main_is_active,
1230                     em.emag_main_sync_status,
1231                     em.emag_main_last_synced,
1232                     em.emag_main_category,
1233                     em.emag_main_pnk,
1234                     em.emag_main_offers,
1235                     em.emag_main_rank,
1236                     ef.emag_id as emag_fbe_id,
1237                     ef.emag_fbe_price,
1238                     ef.emag_fbe_stock,
1239                     ef.emag_fbe_is_active,
1240                     ef.emag_fbe_sync_status,
1241                     ef.emag_fbe_last_synced,
1242                     ef.emag_fbe_category,
1243                     ef.emag_fbe_pnk,
1244                     ef.emag_fbe_offers,
1245                     ef.emag_fbe_rank,
1246                     -- Marketplace presence flags
1247                     CASE WHEN lp.local_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as has_local,
1248                     CASE WHEN em.emag_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as has_emag_main,
1249                     CASE WHEN ef.emag_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as has_emag_fbe,
1250                     -- Computed fields
1251                     CASE
1252                         WHEN lp.local_id IS NOT NULL AND em.emag_id IS NULL AND ef.emag_id IS NULL THEN 'local_only'
1253                         WHEN lp.local_id IS NULL AND (em.emag_id IS NOT NULL OR ef.emag_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'emag_only'
1254                         WHEN em.emag_id IS NOT NULL AND ef.emag_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'both_accounts'
1255                         WHEN em.emag_id IS NOT NULL AND ef.emag_id IS NULL THEN 'main_only'
1256                         WHEN em.emag_id IS NULL AND ef.emag_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'fbe_only'
1257                         ELSE 'unknown'
1258                     END as marketplace_presence,
1259                     GREATEST(lp.local_updated_at, em.emag_main_last_synced, ef.emag_fbe_last_synced) as last_updated
1260                 FROM local_products lp
1261                 FULL OUTER JOIN emag_main_products em ON lp.sku = em.sku
1262                 FULL OUTER JOIN emag_fbe_products ef ON COALESCE(lp.sku, em.sku) = ef.sku
1263             )
1264             SELECT * FROM unified
1265             WHERE {where_clause}
1266             ORDER BY last_updated DESC NULLS LAST
1267             LIMIT :limit OFFSET :skip
1268         """)
1269
results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.

1279             ),

1286                     COALESCE(lp.sku, em.sku, ef.sku) as sku,

1288                     lp.local_id,

1290                     ef.emag_id as emag_fbe_id,
1291                     GREATEST(lp.local_updated_at, em.emag_main_last_synced, ef.emag_fbe_last_synced) as last_updated

results.code:
22 
23 def create_token(
24     subject: str | Any,
25     token_type: str = "access",
26     expires_delta: timedelta | None = None,
27     additional_claims: dict[str, Any] | None = None,
28     algorithm: str | None = None,
29 ) -> str:
30     """Create a JWT token with the specified subject and claims.
31 
32     Args:
33         subject: The subject of the token (usually a user ID or username)
34         token_type: Type of token (access or refresh)
35         expires_delta: Optional timedelta for token expiration
36         additional_claims: Additional claims to include in the token
37         algorithm: JWT signing algorithm (default: settings.JWT_ALGORITHM)
38 
39     Returns:
40         str: Encoded JWT token
41 
42     """
43     now = datetime.now(UTC)
44 
45     # Set expiration time based on token type
46     if expires_delta:
47         expire = now + expires_delta
48     elif token_type == "refresh":
49         expire = now + timedelta(days=settings.refresh_token_expire_days)
50     else:
51         expire = now + timedelta(minutes=settings.access_token_expire_minutes)
52 
53     # Get the active key for signing
54     key = key_manager.get_active_key()
55 
56     # Use provided algorithm or default from settings
57     alg = algorithm or settings.jwt_algorithm
58     if alg not in SUPPORTED_ALGORITHMS:
59         raise ValueError(f"Unsupported JWT algorithm: {alg}")
60 
61     # Prepare the token claims
62     to_encode = {
63         "iss": settings.jwt_issuer,
64         "sub": str(subject),
65         "aud": settings.jwt_audience,
66         "iat": int(now.timestamp()),
67         "exp": int(expire.timestamp()),
68         "nbf": int(
69             now.timestamp() - settings.jwt_leeway,
70         ),  # Not before with leeway for clock skew
71         "jti": f"{now.timestamp()}-{subject}",
72         "kid": key.kid,
73         "typ": token_type,
74     }
75 
76     # Add additional claims if provided
77     if additional_claims:
78         to_encode.update(additional_claims)
79 
80     try:
81         # Encode the token with the private key
82         return jwt.encode(
83             to_encode,
84             key.private_key,
85             algorithm=alg,
86             headers={
87                 "kid": key.kid,
88                 "alg": alg,
89                 "typ": "JWT",
90             },
91         )
92     except JWTError as e:
93         raise JWTError(f"Failed to encode token: {e}")
94
